board: __note('Welcome to Reduct! Try dragging the star and square onto the lambdas.')
levels.textgoal: Check out this little alien. It doesn't do anything, but it's vibing.

board: __note('Make sure you check out the hints at the top.')
levels.textgoal: Use the things on the board and in your toolbox to get what's in the goal.
Functions are values. That means functions can return other functions...
Functions can also take other functions as parameters.
